description: This file defines a Flutter widget called ProfileScreen that displays user profile information, including user details, navigational menu items, and a logout button. It depends on external state management via Provider to access authentication state and user data.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders the user's profile information and menu options, allowing navigation to different parts of the app and providing a logout functionality.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the profile screen, displaying user info, menu options, and a logout button with confirmation dialog.
